title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed data analytics products and automated pipelines to drive business growth. Built AWS/GCP solutions enabling cross-team collaboration. Managed partner programs to amplify business performance. Delivered analytics via Databricks and scaled infrastructure with Terraform and GitHub CI/CD.

title: Fullstack Engineer
responsibilities: Designed and maintained distributed systems on Kubernetes. Standardized release tagging with Conventional Commits. Built Docker-based dev environments and integrated Elastic/Grafana for observability. Optimized PostgreSQL databases and implemented full test coverage. Developed CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, Bitbucket) and followed Agile processes using Jira. Tech Stack: Docker, Kubernetes, Typescript, Kafka, Microservices, Postgres.

title: Technical Team Lead
responsibilities: Led an 8-member team to deliver a multilingual Greenfield site across 5 regions. Directed development of a CMS, auto-translation service (AWS), and BFF using Gatsby and GraphQL. Architected AWS-based infrastructure (EC2, Lambda@Edge) for high performance. Implemented SEO, Google Tag Manager, Analytics, and Ads. Designed CI/CD workflows for multi-domain releases. Standardized code quality with ESLint, Prettier, Husky, and Git hooks. Maintained shared libraries (Artifactory) and contributed to the corporate design system.

title: Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Designed and developed new user interfaces for front-end projects. Researched and applied front-end best practices to ensure modern, efficient design. Built cross-browser compatible solutions to ensure consistent user experiences across platforms. Implemented accessibility standards and user-centered design principles to enhance usability. Collaborated closely with backend teams to integrate APIs and ensure seamless functionality. Tech Stacks: Vue.js, Nuxt.js.

title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Designed and developed new features and components for backend systems using PHP and the Laravel framework. Built and maintained front-end websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. Maintained and enhanced front-end applications built with the Vue.js framework. Managed data integrity by reviewing data transfers and maintaining records in a centralized database. Analyzed abnormal data patterns and records, developing algorithms to extract business insights. Communicated with suppliers, agents, and customers to provide technical solutions, guidance, and manage relationships effectively.
